snippet: People with ties to Bob Jones University criticized the firing of a Christian consulting group the school hired to investigate its handling of sexual assaults.
abstract: People with ties to Bob Jones University criticize firing of Christian consulting group Godly Response to Abuse in the Christian Environment, or Grace, that school hired to investigate its handling of sexual assaults.
